text: Hitobito (rūto no min) wa isoide kare no moto ni kita. Kore made kare-ra wa, kegarawashī okonai (danshoku kōi) o shite itanode, kare wa itta. `Watashi no hitobito yo, koko ni watashi no musume-tachi ga iru. Anata gata ni totte wa (musume-tachi to kekkon suru koto ga) mottomo seijōdearu. Arrā o osore nasai. Watashi no hinkyaku ni kanshite, watashi ni haji o kaka senaide kure. Anata gata no naka ni, tadashī kokoro no mono ga hitori mo inai no ka
